text: Hymenasplenium cardiophyllum is a species of fern in the family Aspleniaceae. It is native to China and Japan. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Aspleniaceae Category:Flora of China Category:Near threatened plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hymenasplenium cardiophyllum
